name: Ext_R4B_Provenance_ag_onBehalfOf
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.Provenance.agent.onBehalfOf for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Provenance.agent.onBehalfOf from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Provenance|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: The individual, device, or organization for whom the change was made.
element.comment: `Provenance.agent.onBehalfOf` maps to R5 `Provenance.agent.onBehalfOf`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RelatedPerson)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: The individual, device, or organization for whom the change was made.
element.comment: `Provenance.agent.onBehalfOf` maps to R5 `Provenance.agent.onBehalfOf`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RelatedPerson)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
